input.sentences: we took a trip to our country 's capital .
many of the columns on the buildings were beautiful .
the stained glass windows were as well .
output.sentences: When you take a trip to a country be sure to see it's capital.
There are always interesting landmarks around them.
And of course you can enjoy the impressive architecture.
Many of the columns on the buildings are beautiful.
Some of the buildings have beautiful stained glass windows.
